title: Fortune Telling
description: Are you trying to predict the future, and assuming it will be negative?

title: Over-Estimating Danger
description: Do you feel like something terrible is about to occur?

title: Catastrophising
description: Are you imagining the worst situation possible, and that you will be unable to cope?

title: Mind Reading
description: Are you assuming that you know exactly what someone is thinking, and that it is negative?

title: Black and White Thinking
description: Are you thinking in extremes about the situation? Maybe it seems really good or really bad, but in reality it will be somewhere in between

title: Over-Generalising
description: Are you making sweeping judgements about things, based on a past experience? (For example, using words like 'always' or 'never')

title: Negative Brain Filter
description: Are you only paying attention to the bad things that are happening, and ignoring the good things?

title: "Should" Statements
description: Are you telling yourself how you "should" feel in behave, instead of listening & watching to how you actually feel and behave?

title: Emotional Reasoning
description: Are you believing something to be true based on feelings, rather than facts?

title: Unsure
description: None of these seem to apply
